name: Syncly
headline: AI to auto-analyze all your customer communications
description: We help CX and the product team to get product insights and help proactively engage with their customers before they churn by auto-analyzing all the customer communications. Our team previously founded and sold a $200M AI technology startup.

## Empowering Teams Across All Industries
Supercharge CX/CS, Product, Ops, and Leadership Teams

## Customizable Taxonomy
Intent-based Analysis and Automatic Classification allows you to analyze with autonomy and maximum accuracy, and uncover actionable opportunities effortlessly.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/customizable-taxonomy>)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VFIAuwMlqGLAslNGE4QgglG9o.jpg)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VFIAuwMlqGLAslNGE4QgglG9o.jpg)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7jPuyRxeGf8cw97UNmyGTbbHo.jpg)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7jPuyRxeGf8cw97UNmyGTbbHo.jpg)
## Personalized Dashboard
Automate your VoC report with customizable dashboards and workflows. Visualize trends and get summaries, predictions, and tailored recommendations.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/personalized-dashboard>)
## Sentiment Analysis
Get holistic visibility across the entire user journey to identify at-risk customers before churn, allowing proactive action to improve retention.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/sentiment-analysis>)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BmUnbQXLeYZQ63i26r601blea2s.jpg)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BmUnbQXLeYZQ63i26r601blea2s.jpg)

![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/YzNO1bFr1hWkj25EgvSCgPIgjM.png)
## AI-Powered Intelligence
Leverage root cause analysis to uncover hidden patterns in your customer feedback, and Syncly AI to instantly answer critical business questions.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/ai-powered-intelligence>)
## Real-Time Alerts
Instantly detect and notify of negative feedback, prioritize high-impact issues, and flag overlooked emerging issues for swift action.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/real-time-alerts>)
![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4HMsFcnImPMzqaPVpBtnNnXuqk.jpg)

![Section Image](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tURksgsZdWNMqc09YePFKpifQXk.jpg)
## Social Listening
Gain more accurate market insights with AI-enabled Noise Filter and Precision AI-analysis, enable teams to take impactful actions from social media feedback.
[Learn more![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aJIk4NRfANfPH6NS03pJgS7c60.png)](https://syncly.app/<./product/social-listening>)

generated_description:
Meet **Syncly**, a promising startup founded in 2022 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch W23. Hailing from San Francisco, this company is making strides in the B2B SaaS landscape by leveraging **AI** to provide deep insights into customer communications. 

### Mission
Syncly’s mission is straightforward yet powerful: to **auto-analyze** all your customer communications, providing organizations with actionable insights that enhance customer experience. This intelligence helps customer experience (CX) and product teams proactively engage with customers, especially those at risk of churning.

### Team and Background
The team behind Syncly isn’t just any group of entrepreneurs—the founders previously built an AI technology startup that they scaled and sold for **$200M**. Their experience and expertise are invaluable assets as they embark on this new venture, which currently comprises a compact team of **nine** passionate individuals. 

### Core Offerings
Syncly's platform acts as a **Customer Feedback Intelligence System** that equips teams across various industries—from CX and Product to Operations and Management—with tools to supercharge customer insights. Here are some key features:

- **Holistic Customer Intelligence:** Quickly spot and address issues affecting customer experience.
- **Proactive Churn Prevention:** Employ sentiment alerts to engage at-risk customers before they decide to leave.
- **AI-Powered Analysis:** Utilize self-training AI to gain detailed insights without the complexity that usually comes with AI solutions.
- **Customizable Taxonomy:** Offer intent-based analysis and automatic classification for enhanced autonomy and accuracy.
- **Real-Time Alerts:** Instantly detect negative feedback to prioritize swift corrective action.

Their dedication to a **customer-centric approach** aims to enhance overall customer satisfaction, boost retention, and drive sustainable growth.

### Additional Notes
Syncly is tagged as a player in the **generative AI, SaaS, B2B, and customer support** domains, making it an exciting prospect for businesses looking for innovative ways to leverage customer feedback.

In short, Syncly is positioned to revolutionize the way organizations understand and interact with their customers—using AI not just to collect data but to turn it into powerful insights that drive action. Want to learn more? Check out their [website](https://syncly.app/) or book a demo to experience their solutions firsthand.
